segment.phrase: Chinachitika n’chiyani ndi shawelo?
Gautama Buddha anali mphunzitsi wanzeru. Analipo zaka zambiri zapitazo. Anaphunzitsa anthu kukhala ndi moyo wopepuka komanso woyamikira m’moyo.
Tsiku lina wansembe anafika kwa Buddha.
“Chonde, Buddha,” anatero wansembe. “Kodi ndingapezeko shawelo yatsopano?”
Buddha anamuyang’ana wansembeyo.
“Koma shawelo yako yakale yatani?” anafunsa Buddha. “Kodi waitaya?”
“Ndinaganiza zoitaya shaweloyo,” anatero wansembe. “Koma ndinakumbukira chiphunzitso chanu. Mumati tizigwiritsa ntchito bwino zinthu zonse.”
“Ndiye watani nayo?” anafunsa Buddha.
“Ndapeza njira ina yoigwiritsira ntchito shaweloyo,” anatero wansembe. “Ndikuigwiritsa ntchito ngati bedi shiti.”
“Wachita bwino,” anatero Buddha. “Koma nanga bedi shiti yako inatani?”
“Inapepeyala,” anatero wansembe. “Ndiye ndinaisandutsa pilo kesi.”
Buddha anakhutira. “Zili bwino kuti unagwiritsanso ntchito bedi shiti yako,” anatero. “Koma nanga pilo kesi yako yakale inatani?”
“Aaa,” anatero wansembe. “Pilo kesi yanga inang’ambika malo amene ndimaikapo mutu. Inabooka! Ndiye tsopano ndinaipanga kukhala chopondapo mapazi.”
“Eyaa,” anatero Buddha. “Nanga chopondapo mapazi chakale. Chinatani?”
“Chopondapo mapazi chitatha, ndinapota zingwe zake kukhala chingwe cha nyali,” anatero wansembe. “Ndikugwiritsa ntchito chingwecho m’nyali yanga yamafuta.”
Gautama Buddha anakhutira kwambiri. Wansembeyo anaphunziradi bwino. Anagwiritsa ntchito zinthu zake bwino ndipo sanataye kanthu.
“Wachita bwino,” anatero Buddha. “Popeza wachita mwanzeru ndi mosamala, ndikupatsa shawelo yatsopano. Ndikudziwa kuti ukaisamalira bwino.”
